sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job đang tuyển?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'

sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job đăng hôm nay?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND CAST(posted_at AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)

sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job ở Hà Nội?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.province_name = N'Hà Nội'

sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job ở Đà Nẵng?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.province_name = N'Đà Nẵng'

sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job remote?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND work_type = N'Remote'

sql_examples.question: Có bao nhiêu job fulltime?
sql_examples.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM JobsPosting WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND work_type = N'Full-time'

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm ở Hà Nội
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.province_name = N'Hà Nội' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm ở Hồ Chí Minh
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.province_name = N'Hồ Chí Minh' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
sql_examples.description: List jobs in Ho Chi Minh

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm ở Đà Nẵng
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.province_name = N'Đà Nẵng' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm developer
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%developer%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm frontend developer
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%frontend%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm backend developer
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%backend%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm fullstack developer
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%fullstack%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm remote
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.work_type = N'Remote' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm part-time
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.work_type = N'Part-time' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm designer
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%designer%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm marketing
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%marketing%' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Top 5 job lương cao nhất
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 5 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.salary_max IS NOT NULL ORDER BY jp.salary_max DESC

sql_examples.question: Top 10 job mới nhất
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.posted_at FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Thống kê job theo địa điểm
sql_examples.sql: SELECT p.province_name as location, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY p.province_name ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Thống kê job theo vị trí
sql_examples.sql: SELECT jp.position, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY jp.position ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Thống kê job theo danh mục
sql_examples.sql: SELECT c.name, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Categories c ON jp.category_id = c.category_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Top 5 vị trí có nhiều job nhất
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 5 jp.position, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY jp.position ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Thống kê job theo loại công việc
sql_examples.sql: SELECT jp.work_type, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY jp.work_type ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Thống kê mức lương trung bình theo địa điểm
sql_examples.sql: SELECT p.province_name as location, AVG(jp.salary_max) as avg_salary, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.salary_max IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.province_name ORDER BY avg_salary DESC

sql_examples.question: Top 10 địa điểm có nhiều job nhất
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 p.province_name as location, COUNT(*) as job_count FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY p.province_name ORDER BY job_count DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm developer lương trên 20 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%developer%' AND jp.salary_max >= 20000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm lương từ 15 triệu trở lên
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.salary_max >= 15000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm lương trên 30 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.salary_max >= 30000000 ORDER BY jp.salary_max DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm lương từ 10 đến 20 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.salary_min >= 10000000 AND jp.salary_max <= 20000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm remote lương cao
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.work_type = N'Remote' AND jp.salary_max >= 20000000 ORDER BY jp.salary_max DESC

sql_examples.question: Danh sách việc làm developer ở Hà Nội lương trên 20 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%developer%' AND p.province_name = N'Hà Nội' AND jp.salary_max >= 20000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
sql_examples.description: Developer jobs in Hanoi with salary > 20M

sql_examples.question: Việc làm backend developer ở Hồ Chí Minh
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%backend%' AND p.province_name = N'Hồ Chí Minh' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
sql_examples.description: Backend developer jobs in Ho Chi Minh

sql_examples.question: Việc làm fullstack developer lương từ 25 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%fullstack%' AND jp.salary_max >= 25000000 ORDER BY jp.salary_max DESC

sql_examples.question: Việc làm frontend ở Hà Nội lương 15-25 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%frontend%' AND p.province_name = N'Hà Nội' AND jp.salary_min >= 15000000 AND jp.salary_max <= 25000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
sql_examples.description: Frontend jobs in Hanoi with salary 15M-25M

sql_examples.question: Việc làm remote developer lương cao
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, jp.work_type FROM JobsPosting jp WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.work_type = N'Remote' AND jp.position LIKE N'%developer%' AND jp.salary_max >= 25000000 ORDER BY jp.salary_max DESC
sql_examples.description: Remote developer jobs with high salary

sql_examples.question: Việc làm designer ở Hồ Chí Minh lương trên 15 triệu
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%designer%' AND p.province_name = N'Hồ Chí Minh' AND jp.salary_max >= 15000000 ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
sql_examples.description: Designer jobs in Ho Chi Minh with salary > 15M

sql_examples.question: Việc làm marketing ở Đà Nẵng
sql_examples.sql: SELECT TOP 10 jp.job_id, jp.position, jp.title, jp.salary_min, jp.salary_max, p.province_name as location FROM JobsPosting jp LEFT JOIN Provinces p ON jp.province_id = p.province_id WHERE jp.status = 'ACTIVE' AND jp.position LIKE N'%marketing%' AND p.province_name = N'Đà Nẵng' ORDER BY jp.posted_at DESC
